016package com.nickbenn.adventofcode.model;
017
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.Collections;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.Random;
022import java.util.function.Predicate;
023import java.util.random.RandomGenerator;
024import java.util.stream.Stream;
025
026public enum CardinalDirection implements Direction {
027
028  NORTH(-1, 0),
029  EAST(0, 1),
030  SOUTH(1, 0),
031  WEST(0, -1);
032
033  private final int rowOffset;
034  private final int columnOffset;
035
036  CardinalDirection(int rowOffset, int columnOffset) {
037    this.rowOffset = rowOffset;
038    this.columnOffset = columnOffset;
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public int rowOffset() {
043    return rowOffset;
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  public int columnOffset() {
048    return columnOffset;
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public CardinalDirection opposite() {
053    CardinalDirection[] values = values();
054    int length = values.length;
055    return values[(ordinal() + length / 2) % length];
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public CardinalDirection nextClockwise() {
060    CardinalDirection[] values = values();
061    return values[(ordinal() + 1) % values.length];
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  public CardinalDirection nextCounterClockwise() {
066    CardinalDirection[] values = values();
067    return values[(ordinal() - 1 + values.length) % values.length];
068  }
069
070  public static CardinalDirection choose(RandomGenerator rng, Predicate<CardinalDirection> filter) {
071    CardinalDirection[] values = values();
072    return values[rng.nextInt(values.length)];
073  }
074
075  public static Stream<Direction> stream() {
076    return Stream.of(values());
077  }
078
079  public static Stream<Direction> randomStream(Random rng) {
080    List<Direction> shuffled = new ArrayList<>();
081    Collections.addAll(shuffled, values());
082    Collections.shuffle(shuffled, rng);
083    return shuffled.stream();
084  }
085
086}
